name: Pharos
headline: Automate hospital reporting and prevent patient harm with AI
description:
Pharos automates hospital quality reporting, saving millions in labour costs and helping to prevent avoidable patient harm. 

Today, clinicians spend thousands of hours manually pulling complex facts out of medical records for mandatory reporting and quality improvement.

Our AI pulls those facts out of unstructured medical records automatically. We automate reporting and show staff where avoidable patient harm is happening.
tags: industry:health-tech; industry:digital-health; industry:healthcare; industry:healthcare-it; industry:ai; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Felix Brann, Founder
founders.description:
CEO at Pharos. Previously VP Data Science at vital.io and VP Quantitative Research at JP. Morgan. 

Obsessed with sepsis: https://ai.jmir.org/2024/1/e49784

founders.name: Matthew Jones, Founder
founders.description: Founder and CTO at Pharos. Previously I was part of the founding team of Market2x, a rural trucking SAAS startup, growing that from inception to international expansion. The rest of my career has been as a software engineer at various health tech companies.

AI-powered analytics for quality and risk teams. Automate data gathering and reporting so you can focus on outcomes.
Let's talk

[![Moxxie](https://pharos.health/assets/moxxie-D6PQSIJs.png)](https://pharos.health/<https:/www.moxxie.vc>)
[![Felicis](https://pharos.health/assets/felicis-86i-spq1.png)](https://pharos.health/<https:/www.felicis.com>)
[![General Catalyst](https://pharos.health/assets/gc-CPOsZLx6.png)](https://pharos.health/<https:/www.generalcatalyst.com>)
![Product screenshot](https://pharos.health/assets/quality-B3StLha3.jpeg)
## Rapid Reporting
Your hospital at your fingertips.
We cut through your hospital data, letting you pull critical reports without manual work.
Chart Abstraction
    
Automatically abstract charts for submission to clinical registries and more. Perform fast, accurate review using AI.
RCAs
    
Allow clinicians to complete RCAs in hours instead of weeks. Minimise the lag between safety events and process change.
Audits
    
See your whole hospital's performance on JCO and CMS metrics with one click. Handle audit data requests, fast.
## Data Driven Decisions
Get the real story behind every safety event.
Our AI automatically pulls insights from patient charts, giving you visibility without adding to IT backlogs or clinical reviewer workloads.
Track
    Monitor QI project adherence and outcomes on a daily basis. Don't wait months to understand what's happening today.
Detect
    Catch near misses, not just sentinel events. Intervene before safety events occur.
Understand
    Safety failings have complex causes. Understand the factors at your hospital and maximise the impact of your QI projects.
## Security
Integrate quickly and securely.
Our integration connectors can source data from any system. Best-in-class security keeps your data safe.
Secure
    
Our HIPAA compliant platform runs in the cloud or locally in your datacenter.
Connect
    
Our team has deep experience integrating with all major EHRs and connected systems.
Verify
    
AI which shows its work. See the reasoning and source documentation for any insight.
![Product screenshot](https://pharos.health/assets/quality-projects-DiJ-d4Wd.jpeg)
# Schedule a demo
Discover how your data could protect your patients today.
Let's talk

AI-powered analytics for quality and risk teams.

generated_description:
**Pharos: Revolutionizing Hospital Reporting with AI**

Founded in 2024 and proudly part of Y Combinator's Batch S24, Pharos is headquartered in San Francisco and commands a nimble team of three. Their core mission is bold: to automate hospital reporting processes and safeguard patients using artificial intelligence. Given the current landscape, where clinicians often waste valuable hours sifting through complex medical records for mandatory reporting, Pharos' solution could not be more timely.

Here's the crux of the problem: healthcare professionals currently bear the burden of painstakingly pulling facts from unstructured medical records. This not only drains resources but also puts patients at risk due to human error. Enter Pharos, which leverages AI to streamline this reporting process. Their technology instantly extracts critical data, allowing healthcare teams to focus on what matters most—patient care.

**What’s In It for Hospitals?**

Pharos offers more than just automation; it enhances patient safety. By identifying areas where patient harm could occur, their AI-powered analytics deliver insights that help prevent adverse events. The Pharos platform enables quick comprehension of quality and risk metrics, turning what used to be weeks of manual effort into mere hours of data processing.

Currently, they are targeting:

- **Chart Abstraction**: Automating the review process for clinical submissions.
- **Root Cause Analyses (RCAs)**: Helping clinicians respond to safety events more swiftly.
- **Compliance Audits**: Providing rapid insights into hospital performance against key metrics.

**Security at its Core**

With a keen eye on data security, Pharos runs a HIPAA-compliant platform adaptable to any data management system, whether cloud-based or local. They understand the importance of privacy in healthcare and are committed to integrating seamlessly with existing Electronic Health Records (EHRs).

Backing this promising startup are notable names in the venture space, including Moxxie, Felicis, and General Catalyst, with Jared Friedman serving as their Group Partner. Pharos recently raised $5 million in seed funding to fuel its mission to reshape the healthcare narrative through technology.

---

For anyone in the healthcare industry, this is a startup to watch. As Pharos continues to build out its capabilities, the implications for improved efficiency, safety, and ultimately patient outcomes could be profound. 

If you’re interested in seeing how Pharos can transform your hospital data into actionable insights, a demo is just a click away: [Pharos Health](https://pharos.health/).
